name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Voice To Mail: transcribe voice into email

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use voice typing. Dictate into the most popular Email Services: Gmail, Yahoo Mail and Outlook (web).

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
--- How to use ---

1) Install the extension
2) Navigate to your favorite Email Service or reload the page
3) Start composing a new letter
4) Press the green button and start dictation

First time don’t forget to give the extension microphone permission.

And to insert punctuation mark or special symbol use appropriate Voice Command. Please visit the extension options page to find the full list of Voice Commands.

--- Key Features ---

- It is really simple
- FREE
- No annoying ads
- No personal data collection
- Based on native Chrome technology

--- Some Downsides ---

- For now, the app supports only English Language
- The app is currently in Beta

--- Contact –

In case of any questions, comments or concrete ideas, please email us at: hello@dahae.studio

Made by Da Hae Studio (https://dahae.studio).
